蠘字的基本解释

蠘
jié
梭子蟹，生活在海里的一种螃蟹，甲壳略呈梭形，肉味鲜美。

蠘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《字彙補》疾屑切］
蟹的一种。俗称梭子蟹。

蠘字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蠘； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1101第18
【字彙補】疾屑切，音截。蟹類。【閩中海錯疏】蠘似蟹而大殻，螯有稜鋸。

蠘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蠘字的起名意思

暂无。

Worm
Basic explanation of words
Worm
jié
Portunus, a kind of crab that lives in the sea, has a slightly fusiform carapace and a delicious meat.
Worm
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Zihuibu" chip cutting]
A kind of crab. Commonly known as portunus.
Worm
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蠘; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1101 Page 18
【Word Supplement】Cut off sick chips and cut sound. Crabs. [Minzhonghaicuoshu] The worms resemble crabs with large shells, and their claws have edges and saws.
